tool.name: OpenSwathDecoyGenerator
tool.description: Generates decoys according to different models for a specific TraML
tool.command:
OpenSwathDecoyGenerator
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_method: -method "$param_method" #end if #if $param_decoy_tag: -decoy_tag "$param_decoy_tag" #end if #if $param_mz_threshold: -mz_threshold $param_mz_threshold #end if #if $param_exclude_similar: -exclude_similar #if " " in str($param_exclude_similar): "$param_exclude_similar" #else $param_exclude_similar #end if #end if #if $param_similarity_threshold: -similarity_threshold $param_similarity_threshold #end if #if $param_append: -append #if " " in str($param_append): "$param_append" #else $param_append #end if #end if #if $param_remove_CNterm_mods: -remove_CNterm_mods #if " " in str($param_remove_CNterm_mods): "$param_remove_CNterm_mods" #else $param_remove_CNterm_mods #end if #end if #if $param_remove_unannotated: -remove_unannotated #if " " in str($param_remove_unannotated): "$param_remove_unannotated" #else $param_remove_unannotated #end if #end if #if $param_identity_threshold: -identity_threshold $param_identity_threshold #end if #if $param_max_attempts: -max_attempts $param_max_attempts #end if #if $param_mz_shift: -mz_shift $param_mz_shift #end if #if $param_precursor_mass_shift: -precursor_mass_shift $param_precursor_mass_shift #end if #if $param_allowed_fragment_types: -allowed_fragment_types "$param_allowed_fragment_types" #end if #if $param_allowed_fragment_charges: -allowed_fragment_charges "$param_allowed_fragment_charges" #end if #if $param_enable_detection_specific_losses: -enable_detection_specific_losses #if " " in str($param_enable_detection_specific_losses): "$param_enable_detection_specific_losses" #else $param_enable_detection_specific_losses #end if #end if #if $param_enable_detection_unspecific_losses: -enable_detection_unspecific_losses #if " " in str($param_enable_detection_unspecific_losses): "$param_enable_detection_unspecific_losses" #else $param_enable_detection_unspecific_losses #end if #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_force): "$adv_opts.param_force" #else $adv_opts.param_force #end if #end if #end if

param.name: param_mz_threshold
param.label: MZ threshold in Thomson for fragment ion annotation

param.name: param_exclude_similar
param.label: set this flag if decoy assays with similarity of the peptide sequence to the target assays higher than the identity_threshold should be excluded
param.help: (-exclude_similar) If similarity_threshold is over 0, decoy assays with an absolute difference of the decoy and target product mz smaller than similarity_threshold are further excluded

param.name: param_similarity_threshold
param.label: Similarity threshold for absolute difference of the product mz of target and decoy assays for exclusion in Dalton

param.name: param_append
param.label: set this flag if non-decoy TraML should be appended to the output

param.name: param_remove_CNterm_mods
param.label: set this flag to remove decoy peptides with C/N terminal modifications (may be necessary depending on the decoy generation method)

param.name: param_remove_unannotated
param.label: set this flag if target assays with unannotated ions should be ignored from decoy generation

param.name: param_identity_threshold
param.label: shuffle: identity threshold for the shuffle algorithm

param.name: param_max_attempts
param.label: shuffle: maximum attempts to lower the sequence identity between target and decoy for the shuffle algorithm

param.name: param_mz_shift
param.label: shift: MZ shift in Thomson for shift decoy method

param.name: param_precursor_mass_shift
param.label: Mass shift to apply to the precursor ion

param.name: param_enable_detection_specific_losses
param.label: set this flag if specific neutral losses for detection fragment ions should be allowed

param.name: param_enable_detection_unspecific_losses
param.label: set this flag if unspecific neutral losses (H2O1, H3N1, C1H2N2, C1H2N1O1) for detection fragment ions should be allowed

tool.help:
Generates decoys according to different models for a specific TraML
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_OpenSwathDecoyGenerator.html
